full_summary:
# Government Notice: Request for Proposal (RFP) - Senior Business Systems Analyst

**Request for Proposal #** RFX002409
**Agency Name**: Canada Mortgage and Housing Corporation (CMHC)
**Location**: 700 Montreal Road, Ottawa, Ontario K1A0P7, Canada

## Description
Canada Mortgage and Housing Corporation (CMHC) invites qualified contractors to submit bids for the provision of a Senior Business Systems Analyst. The selected contractor will assist CMHC in the design phase of its transformation program, which aims to modernize technology, change business processes, and improve delivery of services for clients.

## Scope of Work
- Provide senior-level business systems analysis support to CMHC's transformation program
- Conduct analysis, design, and development of business systems to support program objectives
- Collaborate with CMHC teams to develop business requirements, technical requirements, and testing strategies

## Experience Requirements
- Minimum 5 years of experience in business systems analysis
- Proven experience in analyzing complex business systems and developing solutions
- Strong analytical skills, business acumen, and technical knowledge

## Evaluation Criteria
- Business Systems Analysis Skills (20 points)
- Expertise in Canada's Housing Market (15 points)
- Understanding of Business Intelligence (20 points)
- Price Factor (45 points)

## Contact Information
- David LaBerge
- Email: dlaberge@cmhc-schl.gc.ca
- Phone: (613) 748-4794

## Submission Requirements
- Proposals are to be submitted electronically through the [Government of Canada Tenders website](https://canadabuys.canada.ca/). 
- All proposals must be received by 2:00 pm Eastern Time on **2023-09-29T14:00:00**.
- Quotations are to be priced in CAD.

Note: Please ensure that you meet the eligibility criteria before responding to this solicitation.

TC Public has provided documentation to aid registered users in developing proposal submissions by visiting the link below: [Download Attachment](https://canadabuys.canada.ca/sites/default/files/webform/tender_notice/9244/rfx002409-tbips-bid-solicitation---senior-business-analyst_1.pdf)

Requirements for this solicitation are subject to the Canadian Free Trade Agreement (CFTA), the Canada-European Union Comprehensive Economic and Trade Agreement (CETA), and the Canada-Korea Free Trade Agreement (CKFTA).
